name: Story of a Pawn
description:
This is her story, the story of a Pawn that had a dream.

A simple but challenging 1-button puzzle game that requires to plan your moves, play with the rhythm, and take risks.

Controls: Left-Clic or Spacebar

-----------------------------

I've always wanted to make a game about a simple pawn that wants to reach her dream, whatever the difficulties, the fails, the tries... Aren't we all that pawn at a point in our life? :)

-----------------------------

If you like the game, and want me to do more of them, please consider sharing the page and support me, it would be immensely appreciated!

Art, Code, Animation, Story, Concept... by Nicolas Kraj
